issue.title: Crash in AtlasSimInterface from sending walk messages too quickly.

content.raw:
When do you expect 2.6 to be released as package?

I've seen some issues with how steps are handled in feedback, but I'm loathe to introduce more variables this close to qualification.  Having to build the bleeding edge counts as "more variables" :-)

Can you give us some guidance on which branches are the best for testing if we must build to get 1.1.0 by Saturday  (that is, does 1.0.9_integration have the latest fixes for other things merged into it?)
content.html:
When do you expect 2.6 to be released as package?

I've seen some issues with how steps are handled in feedback, but I'm loathe to introduce more variables this close to qualification. Having to build the bleeding edge counts as "more variables" :-)

Can you give us some guidance on which branches are the best for testing if we must build to get 1.1.0 by Saturday (that is, does 1.0.9_integration have the latest fixes for other things merged into it?)
